description.en: The Unicorn's grace awakens your block rate.
description.cns: 增加格挡率。

description.en: Look! Ugly one-horned mule!
description.cns: 看啊！丑陋的独角骡子！

description.en: Used to level up Eggs and F tier pets. Also used to fill the energy gauge of F tier pets.
description.cns: 用来升级宠物蛋和F级宠物。也可以用来填充F级宠物的能量条。

description.en: The Dragon's grace awakens your attack power.
description.cns: 增加攻击力。

description.en: Meddle not in the affairs of the dragon; for you are crunchy and taste good with ketchup.
description.cns: 不要干涉飞龙的事；因为你很松脆，涂上番茄酱后很美味。

description.en: RAWR!!!

description.en: A fox is a wolf who sends flowers.

description.cns: 增加移动速度。

description.en: That’s the most foul, cruel and bad tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!
description.cns: 这是你见过的最邪恶、最残忍、脾气最差的啮齿动物！

description.en: The King Crab's grace awakes your block penetration.
description.cns: 蟹王的恩典唤醒你的格挡穿透。

description.en: Crustacean with incredible claw strength. Don't put anything between those claws!
description.cns: 爪部力量惊人的甲壳动物。不要把任何东西放在它们的爪子之间!

description.en: The only way to find out what animal is inside is to get its Exp to 99.99% and bring it to a Pet Tamer.
description.cns: 想知道里面是什么宠物？唯一方法是使它的经验达到99.99%，然后带到宠物驯兽师那里。

description.en: Good thing these Lions come with courage!
